channel.title: what laptop i should buy for qubes+whonix
channel.description:
I do not want to buy a laptop , and it will not go qubes good. You can write on what kind of laptop you running qubes + whonix? its will really help . Thank you.
p.s librem 15 is cost 2 much. so cant buy that.

item.title: what laptop i should buy for qubes+whonix
item.dc:creator: qubenix
item.description:
Thinkpad T420 with 16GB RAM and i5 is working very well for me. Can find for around $300 in USA. Maybe a little more with the RAM upgrade.

item.title: what laptop i should buy for qubes+whonix
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
This is also a question that could be directed at the Qubes support. Any laptop working well for Qubes will do so for Qubes-Whonix also.

Whonix

Support

Various Ways to get Help with Whonix. Free and Professional Support available.

Read full topic
item.source: what laptop i should buy for qubes+whonix

item.title: what laptop i should buy for qubes+whonix
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

The PC on which I have Qubes installed is a Desktop. Tried it once on a rather old HP-Notebook, though the graphics card was incompatible. My daily-driver, a Surface Pro 4, is sadly also out of the question, since I only got the 4GB-Model, which is quite limiting for something like Qubes.

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic

item.source: what laptop i should buy for qubes+whonix

item.title: what laptop i should buy for qubes+whonix
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

That is an impossible to answer question. I3, I5, I7, etc. are just brand terms and often don’t the abilities of a processor. Sometimes an I3 is faster than an I7. Like I’ve said, the compatibility list should show you devices that work very well with Qubes.

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic

item.title: what laptop i should buy for qubes+whonix
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

Qubes actually offers a list of compatible devices on their site, see: https://www.qubes-os.org/hcl/

Have a nice day,

Ego
